attributes.action: Insert a verdict of "Not Proven" in court for cases such as rape
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Only 5% of people accused of rape go to prison, the others don't because of not enough evidence. This petition calls on the government add a verdict of "not Proven" so that Jurors who believe the defendant comited a crime but cannot prove it can see the defendant pay for his crime

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
